body:
Hi,I am lazerkamikaze, I feel like making this again since of my inactiveness. Some of you may know me, some won't. Here is a short version of what I did before I left. AMA!
  • - Became a TS regular (not anymore)]
  • - Trained SpicyTunaRoll9
  • - Joined a few teams (left because of school)
  • - Got acknowledged as a decent pvper
